00095 void CamCalibration::ClearAll(){
00096   if( m_CH ) cvReleaseMat( &m_CH );
00097   for( int i = 0; i < (int)v_camera.size(); i++ )
00098     delete v_camera[i];
00099   v_camera.clear();
00100   ReleaseOptimalCameraStructure();
00101   v_opt_param.clear();
00102   if( m_CH ) cvReleaseMat( &m_CH ); m_CH = NULL;
00103 }

00109 bool CamCalibration::AddHomography( int c ){
00110   // Check if camera is allocated:
00111   if( (int)v_camera.size() <= c ){
00112     printf("ERROR: Homography has not been added: Camera %i does not exist!\n",c);
00113     return false;
00114   }
00115 
00116   // Create new, empty homography structure:
00117   s_struct_homography *s_homography = new s_struct_homography();
00118 
00119   // Push the homography to the vector:
00120   v_camera[c]->v_homography.push_back( s_homography );
00121 
00122   return true;
00123 }

00125 bool CamCalibration::AddHomography( int c, std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> p, CvMat* ready ){
00126   // Check if camera is allocated:
00127   if( (int)v_camera.size() <= c ){
00128     printf("ERROR: Homography has not been added because Camera %i doesn't exist!\n",c);
00129     return false;
00130   }
00131 
00132   // Create new homography structure:
00133   s_struct_homography *s_homography = new s_struct_homography();
00134 
00135   // Allocate space:
00136   s_homography->s_plane_object->px = new double[p.size()];
00137   s_homography->s_plane_object->py = new double[p.size()];
00138 
00139   // Store m_pp and (px,py) in structure:
00140   for( unsigned i = 0; i < p.size(); i++ ){
00141     // printf("%f %f %f %f\n", p[i].x, p[i].y, p[i].u, p[i].v);
00142     s_homography->s_plane_object->px[i] = p[i].x;
00143     s_homography->s_plane_object->py[i] = p[i].y;
00144     CvMat *plane_point = cvCreateMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1 );
00145     cvmSet( plane_point, 0, 0, p[i].u );
00146     cvmSet( plane_point, 1, 0, p[i].v );
00147     cvmSet( plane_point, 2, 0, 1      );
00148     s_homography->s_plane_object->v_m_pp.push_back( plane_point );
00149   }
00150 
00151   // Tell point number:
00152   s_homography->s_plane_object->p = p.size();
00153 
00154   // Push the homography to the vector:
00155   v_camera[c]->v_homography.push_back( s_homography );
00156 
00157   // Create homography from m_pp and (px,py) in structure:
00158   CreateWorldPlaneHomography( c, (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size()-1, ready );
00159   return true;
00160 }

00162 bool CamCalibration::StoreHomographiesToFile( char* file_name ){
00163   FILE *stream;
00164   char buffer[1000];
00165   int  length;
00166   if( (stream = fopen( file_name, "w+t" )) != NULL ){
00167     for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ ){
00168       for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ ){
00169         if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){
00170           // Camera & Homography & Point number:
00171           s_struct_plane* s_plane_object = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object;
00172           int p = (*s_plane_object).p;
00173           length = sprintf(buffer,"%i %i %i %i %i\n",c,h,p,v_camera[c]->w,v_camera[c]->h);
00174           fwrite( buffer, sizeof(char), length, stream );
00175           // Points:
00176           for( int i = 0; i < p; i++ ){
00177             double x = (*s_plane_object).px[i];
00178             double y = (*s_plane_object).py[i];
00179             double u = cvmGet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i], 0, 0 );
00180             double v = cvmGet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i], 1, 0 );
00181             length = sprintf(buffer,"%f %f %f %f\n",x,y,u,v);
00182             fwrite( buffer, sizeof(char), length, stream );
00183           }
00184           // Homography:
00185           homography *m_homography = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography;
00186           for(int i=0; i < 3; i++) {
00187             for(int j=0; j < 3; j++) {
00188               length = sprintf(buffer,"%f ",m_homography->cvmGet(i,j));
00189               fwrite( buffer, sizeof(char), length, stream );
00190             }
00191             length = sprintf(buffer,"\n");
00192             fwrite( buffer, sizeof(char), length, stream );
00193           }
00194         } else {
00195           length = sprintf(buffer,"%i %i 0 %i %i\n",c,h,v_camera[c]->w,v_camera[c]->h);
00196           fwrite( buffer, sizeof(char), length, stream );
00197         }
00198       }
00199     }
00200     printf("\n----------------------------\n");
00201     printf("Homographies stored to file!\n");
00202     printf("----------------------------\n\n");
00203     fclose( stream );
00204     return true;
00205   } else 
00206     return false;
00207 }

00209 bool CamCalibration::LoadHomographiesFromFile( char* file_name ){
00210   FILE *stream;
00211   int  curr_cam = -1;
00212   if( (stream = fopen( file_name, "r+t" )) != NULL ){
00213     int c,h,p,iw,ih;
00214     c=-1;h=-1;p=-1;iw=-1;ih=-1;
00215     while( fscanf( stream, "%i %i %i %i %i\n", &c, &h, &p, &iw, &ih ) != EOF ){
00216       if( c != curr_cam ){
00217         curr_cam = c;
00218         AddCamera( iw, ih );
00219       }
00220       if( p > 0 ){
00221         float x,y,u,v;
00222         std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> points;
00223         for( int i = 0; i < p; i++ ){
00224           fscanf( stream, "%f %f %f %f\n", &x, &y, &u, &v );
00225           points.push_back( CamCalibration::s_struct_points(u,v,x,y) );
00226         }
00227         // Homography:
00228         homography*  m_homography = new homography();
00229         float h;
00230         for(int i=0; i < 3; i++)
00231           for(int j=0; j < 3; j++) {
00232             fscanf( stream, "%f", &h );
00233             m_homography->cvmSet(i,j,h);
00234           }
00235           AddHomography( c, points, m_homography );
00236       } else
00237         AddHomography( c );
00238     }
00239     fclose( stream );
00240     return true;
00241   } else
00242     return false;
00243 }

00245 std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_solution> CamCalibration::GetRandomSolution( int num ){
00246   std::vector<s_struct_solution> current_solution;
00247   do {
00248     // Get random c and h:
00249     int c,h;
00250     while ((int)v_camera.size() <= (c = rand()/(RAND_MAX/(int)v_camera.size())) );
00251     while ((int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size() <= (h = rand()/(RAND_MAX/(int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size())) );
00252 
00253     // Check if there is a connection:
00254     if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){
00255 
00256       // Check if it is already in the vector:
00257       bool in_vector = false;
00258       for( int i = 0; i < (int)current_solution.size(); i++ )
00259         if( current_solution[i].c == c && current_solution[i].h == h )
00260           in_vector = true;
00261 
00262       // If not already in vector, add element:
00263       if( !in_vector )
00264         current_solution.push_back(s_struct_solution(c,h));
00265     }
00266   } while( (int)current_solution.size() < num );
00267   return current_solution;
00268 }

00270 double CamCalibration::GetScreenDistance( int c, int h1, int h2 ){
00271   // Initialze measure point, projected points & homographies:
00272   double a_w[] = { 0, 0, 1 }; CvMat m_w = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_w );
00273   double a_p1[3]; CvMat m_p1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p1 );
00274   double a_p2[3]; CvMat m_p2 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p2 );
00275   double a_h1[9]; CvMat m_h1 = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_h1  );
00276   double a_h2[9]; CvMat m_h2 = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_h2  );
00277 
00278   // Copy homographies to matrices:
00279   for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00280     for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ ){
00281       cvmSet( &m_h1, i, j, cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h1]->m_homography, i, j ) );
00282       cvmSet( &m_h2, i, j, cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h2]->m_homography, i, j ) );
00283     }
00284 
00285     // Project points using the homographies:
00286     cvMatMul( &m_h1, &m_w, &m_p1 ); HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p1 );
00287     cvMatMul( &m_h2, &m_w, &m_p2 ); HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p2 );
00288 
00289     // Return euclidean distance:
00290     return sqrt( pow(cvmGet(&m_p1,0,0)-cvmGet(&m_p2,0,0),2) + 
00291       pow(cvmGet(&m_p1,1,0)-cvmGet(&m_p2,1,0),2) );
00292 }
00293 
00294 double CamCalibration::GetSolutionQuality( std::vector<s_struct_solution> solution, double p_PreFilter_a, double p_PreFilter_b, double p_PreFilter_c ){
00296   // Q1 - Number of points:
00297   int overall_points = 0;
00298   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )
00299     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00300       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
00301         overall_points += v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->p;
00302 
00303   int solution_points = 0;
00304   for( int i = 0; i < (int)solution.size(); i++ )
00305     solution_points += v_camera[solution[i].c]->v_homography[solution[i].h]->s_plane_object->p;
00306 
00307   //TODO: Should be max_points instead of overall_points here:
00308   double q1 = (double)solution_points/(double)overall_points;
00309 
00311   // Q2 - Number of connections:
00312   int overall_connections  = (int)v_camera.size()*(int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size();
00313   int solution_connections = 0; 
00314   for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); h++ ){
00315     int current_connections = 0;
00316     for( int i = 0; i < (int)solution.size(); i++ )
00317       if( solution[i].h == h )
00318         current_connections++;
00319 
00320     solution_connections += (int)pow((double)current_connections,2.);
00321   }
00322   double q2 = (double)solution_connections/(double)overall_connections;
00323 
00325   // Q3 - Distances:
00326   double overall_distances  = 0;
00327   double solution_distances = 0; 
00328   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ ){
00329     int hom_cam_num = 0;
00330     for( int i = 0; i < (int)solution.size(); i++ )
00331       if( solution[i].c == c )
00332         hom_cam_num++;
00333 
00334     double overall_cam_distances  = pow((double)hom_cam_num,2.)*sqrt(pow((double)v_camera[c]->w,2.)+pow((double)v_camera[c]->h,2.));
00335     double solution_cam_distances = 0;
00336     for( int i = 0; i < (int)solution.size(); i++ )
00337       if( solution[i].c == c )
00338         for( int j = 0; j < (int)solution.size(); j++ )
00339           if( solution[j].c == c )
00340             solution_cam_distances += GetScreenDistance(c,solution[i].h,solution[j].h);
00341 
00342     overall_distances  += overall_cam_distances;
00343     solution_distances += solution_cam_distances;
00344   }
00345 
00346   double q3 = solution_distances/overall_distances;
00347   return p_PreFilter_a*q1+p_PreFilter_b*q2+p_PreFilter_c*q3;
00348 }

00350 // Greedy filter:
00351 bool CamCalibration::FilterBestHomographiesGreedyMethod( int num ){
00352   int cnt = 0;
00353   printf( "INFO: Starting pre-filtering process, greedy method...\n" );
00354   for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00355     for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )
00356       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){
00357         if( cnt >= num ){
00358           DeleteWorldPlaneHomography(c,h);
00359           printf( "INFO: View %i of camera %i has been deleted!\n", h, c );
00360         }
00361         cnt++;
00362       }
00363 
00364       if( cnt < num )
00365         printf( "WARNING: Only %i homographies available instead of the requested %i ones!\n", cnt, num );
00366 
00367       printf( "INFO: Pre-filtering process finished\n" );
00368       return true;
00369 }

00371 static void fill_random(int array[],int size)
00372 {
00373   for (int i=0; i<size; ++i) {
00374     array[i]=i;
00375   }
00376   for (int i=0; i<size; ++i) {
00377     int n = (size*rand())/RAND_MAX;
00378     if (n==i) continue;
00379     if (n<0) n=0;
00380     if (n>=size) n=size-1;
00381     int tmp = array[i];
00382     array[i] = array[n];
00383     array[n] = tmp;
00384   }
00385 }

00387 // Padding filter:
00388 bool CamCalibration::FilterBestHomographiesFillingMethod( int num, double p_PreFilter_a ){
00389   double ratio = p_PreFilter_a; // Ratio of individual and group homographies
00390   int  cam  = (int)v_camera.size();
00391   int  min  = (int)floor((double)num/((double)cam*ratio));
00392   int  cnt  = 0;
00393   int totalHom = 0;
00394 
00395   // 1. PHASE - retain individual cam homographies:
00396   for( int c = 0; c < cam; c++ ){   
00397     int hnum = 0;
00398     for( unsigned h = 0; h < v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00399       if (v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography) {
00400               v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->b_discard=true;
00401               totalHom++;
00402       }
00403     printf("Camera %d: %d homographies\n", c, totalHom);
00404 
00405     for( int i = 0; i < min; i++ ){
00406       int pmax = 0;
00407       int hmax = 0;
00408       // Find discarded homography with most inliers:
00409       for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00410         if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography             &&
00411           v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->p > pmax &&
00412           v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->b_discard                    ){
00413             pmax = (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->p;
00414             hmax = h;
00415         }
00416         // Set this homography to "not discarded":
00417         if( pmax > 0 ){
00418           //printf("individuals: %i %i\n",c,hmax);
00419           v_camera[c]->v_homography[hmax]->b_discard = false;
00420           cnt++; hnum++;
00421         }
00422     }
00423     // You will need at least 3 individual homographies for calibration:
00424     if( hnum < 2 ){
00425       printf( "ERROR: Could not detect >= 2 homographies for camera %i\n", c );
00426       return false;
00427     }
00428   }
00429 
00430   int *random_h = new int [v_camera[0]->v_homography.size()];
00431   fill_random(random_h,v_camera[0]->v_homography.size());
00432   // 2. PHASE - fill with group cam homographies:
00433   for( int i = cam; i > 0; i-- ){
00434     for( int _h = 0; _h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); _h++ ){
00435       int h = random_h[_h];
00436       int con = 0;
00437       for( int c = 0; c < cam; c++ )
00438         if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
00439           con++;
00440       if( con == i )
00441         for( int c2 = 0; c2 < cam; c2++ ){
00442           if( v_camera[c2]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){
00443             if( v_camera[c2]->v_homography[h]->b_discard ){
00444               v_camera[c2]->v_homography[h]->b_discard = false;
00445               cnt++;
00446               //printf("multi: %i %i\n",c2,h);
00447             }
00448           }
00449           if( cnt >= num )
00450             break;
00451         }
00452         if( cnt >= num )
00453           break;
00454     }
00455     if( cnt >= num )
00456       break;
00457   }
00458 
00459   // Phase 2.5: try every possible pair, just in case we missed some.
00460   for( int i = 0; i < cam; i++ ){
00461     for( int j = 0; j < cam; j++ ){
00462       int taken=0;
00463       int missed=0;
00464       for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); h++ ) {
00465         if (v_camera[i]->v_homography[h]->m_homography 
00466           && v_camera[j]->v_homography[h]->m_homography) {
00467             if (!v_camera[i]->v_homography[h]->b_discard
00468               && !v_camera[j]->v_homography[h]->b_discard)
00469               taken++;
00470             else
00471               missed++;
00472         }
00473       }
00474       if (taken > 5 || missed ==0) continue;
00475       int required = imin(missed,5);
00476       for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); h++ ) {
00477         if (v_camera[i]->v_homography[h]->m_homography 
00478           && v_camera[j]->v_homography[h]->m_homography) {
00479             if (v_camera[i]->v_homography[h]->b_discard
00480               || v_camera[j]->v_homography[h]->b_discard) 
00481             {
00482               v_camera[i]->v_homography[h]->b_discard=false;
00483               v_camera[j]->v_homography[h]->b_discard=false;
00484               if (--required==0) break;
00485             }
00486         }
00487       }
00488     }
00489   }
00490 
00491   // 3. PHASE - discard unused homographies:
00492   for( int c = 0; c < cam; c++ )
00493     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00494       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography && 
00495         v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->b_discard       )
00496         DeleteWorldPlaneHomography(c,h);
00497 
00498   // ensure we did not intensionally drop connectivity
00499   for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); h++ ) {
00500     bool taken=false;
00501     for( int c = 0; c < cam; c++ ) {
00502       taken = taken || (v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography &&
00503         !v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->b_discard);
00504     }
00505     if (taken)
00506       for( int c = 0; c < cam; c++ ) {
00507         if (v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography && v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->b_discard) {
00508           v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->b_discard=false;
00509           cnt++;
00510         }
00511       }
00512   }
00513 
00514   // Return true only if homography number is sufficient:
00515   if( cnt >= num ) {
00516     printf( "Selected %d homographies out of %d. Minimum was: %d\n", cnt, totalHom, num );
00517     return true;
00518   } else {
00519     printf( "ERROR: Only %i homographies available instead of the requested %i ones!\n", cnt, num );
00520     return false;
00521   }
00522 }

00524 bool CamCalibration::FilterBestHomographiesRandomMethod( int num, int p_Solutions, double p_PreFilter_a, double p_PreFilter_b, double p_PreFilter_c  ){
00525 
00526   int hom_num = 0;
00527 
00528   // 1. PHASE - count all homographies:
00529   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )
00530     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00531       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
00532         hom_num++;
00533 
00534   // If not enough homographies available, print error message:
00535   if( num > hom_num ){
00536     printf( "ERROR: Only %i homographies available instead of the requested %i ones!\n", hom_num, num );
00537     return false;
00538   } else
00539     printf( "Filtering %i homographies out of %i ones ...\n", num, hom_num );
00540 
00541   // 2. PHASE - create random solutions and take best one:
00542   std::vector<s_struct_solution> best_solution;
00543   double best_quality = 0;
00544   for( int i = 0; i < p_Solutions; i++ ){
00545     std::vector<s_struct_solution> current_solution = GetRandomSolution( num );
00546     printf("Solution %i, ",i);
00547 
00548     double current_quality = GetSolutionQuality( current_solution, p_PreFilter_a, p_PreFilter_b, p_PreFilter_c  );
00549     printf("quality: %f",current_quality);
00550     if( current_quality > best_quality ){
00551       best_solution = current_solution;
00552       best_quality  = current_quality;
00553     }
00554     printf("best: %f",best_quality);
00555     printf("\n");
00556   }
00557 
00558   // 3. PHASE - filter best Solutions:
00559   int deleted = 0;
00560   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )
00561     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00562       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){    
00563         bool del_hom = true;
00564 
00565         // Search in best solution if homography is there:
00566         for( int i = 0; i < (int)best_solution.size(); i++ )
00567           if( c == best_solution[i].c && h == best_solution[i].h )
00568             del_hom = false;
00569 
00570         if( del_hom ){
00571           DeleteWorldPlaneHomography(c,h);
00572           deleted++;
00573         }
00574       }
00575 
00576       return true;
00577 }
00578 
00579 bool CamCalibration::Calibrate( int p_HomographyNum, int p_PreFilter, int p_Solutions, double p_PreFilter_a, double p_PreFilter_b, double p_PreFilter_c,
00580                                double p_InitialGuess_a, double p_InitialGuess_b, double p_InitialGuess_c,
00581                                int p_Iterations, double p_Epsilon, double p_PostFilter ){
00582 
00583                                  // Starting values for statistics:
00584                                  stat_HomographyNum = p_HomographyNum;
00585                                  stat_ExpStartTime  = time(0);
00586 
00587                                  bool filter_ok;
00588                                  switch( p_PreFilter ){
00589     case  0: filter_ok = FilterBestHomographiesGreedyMethod ( p_HomographyNum );  break;
00590     case  1: filter_ok = FilterBestHomographiesFillingMethod( p_HomographyNum, p_PreFilter_a ); break; 
00591     case  2: filter_ok = FilterBestHomographiesRandomMethod ( p_HomographyNum, p_Solutions, p_PreFilter_a, p_PreFilter_b, p_PreFilter_c );  break;
00592     default: filter_ok = FilterBestHomographiesFillingMethod( p_HomographyNum, p_PreFilter_a ); break;
00593                                  }
00594 
00595                                  if( !filter_ok ){
00596                                    printf("ERROR: Homography filtering process failed!\n");
00597                                    return false;
00598                                  }
00599 
00600                                  // Perform initial guess:
00601                                  for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ ){
00602                                    if( !ExtractIntrinsicParameters( c, p_InitialGuess_a, p_InitialGuess_b, p_InitialGuess_c ) ){
00603                                      printf("ERROR: Extraction of intrinsic parameters of camera %i failed!\n",c);
00604                                      return false;
00605                                    }
00606                                    CreateEstimatedCalibrationMatrixFromEstimatedIntrinsicParameters( c );
00607                                    CreateEstimatedInverseCalibrationMatrixFromEstimatedIntrinsicParameters( c );
00608                                    CreateAllRotationTranslationMatrices( c );
00609                                  }
00610 
00611                                  // Do optimization:
00612                                  if( OptimizeCalibrationByMinimalParameterMethod( p_Iterations, p_Epsilon, p_PostFilter ) ){
00613                                    return true;
00614                                  } else
00615                                    return false;
00616 }
00617 
00618 void CamCalibration::PrintStatisticToFile(){
00619   FILE * stat;
00620   stat = fopen( "stat.txt", "a" );
00621   fprintf( stat, "%i %ld", stat_HomographyNum, time(0)-stat_ExpStartTime);
00622   for( int i = 0; i < (int)v_camera.size(); i++ )
00623     for( int j = 0; j < 4; j++ )
00624       fprintf( stat, " %f", v_opt_param[i*4+j] );
00625   fprintf( stat, "\n" );
00626   printf("Statistic has successfully been saved!\n");
00627   fclose( stat );
00628 }
00629 
00630 void CamCalibration::CreateAllRotationTranslationMatrices( int c ){
00631   for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
00632     if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
00633       CreateRotationTranslationMatrixFromInverseCalibrationMatrixAndHomography( c, h );
00634 }
00635 
00636 CvMat* CamCalibration::GetM( enum matrix_desc desc, int c, int h ){
00637   switch( desc ){
00638     case m_calibration: return v_camera[c]->m_calibration_matrix;
00639     case m_rot_trans  : return v_camera[c]->m_rot_trans_matrix;
00640     case m_estim_calib: return v_camera[c]->m_estim_calib_matrix;
00641     case m_estinvcalib: return v_camera[c]->m_estinvcalib_matrix;
00642     case m_estim_r_t  : return v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_estim_r_t_matrix;
00643     case m_jacobian   : return v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_jacobian_matrix;\
00644     default     : return NULL;
00645   }
00646 }
00647 
00648 double CamCalibration::GetRandomValue( double min, double max ){
00649   double delta = max - min;
00650   double value = (double)rand()/(double)RAND_MAX;
00651   return min + delta*value; 
00652 }
00653 
00654 // Box-Muller method:
00655 void CamCalibration::AddGaussianNoise( CvMat* mat, double noise ){
00656   double u1 = GetRandomValue( 0, 1 );
00657   double u2 = GetRandomValue( 0, 1 );
00658   cvmSet( mat, 0, 0, cvmGet( mat, 0, 0 ) + noise*sqrt(-2.00*log(u1))*cos(2*M_PI*u2) );
00659   cvmSet( mat, 1, 0, cvmGet( mat, 1, 0 ) + noise*sqrt(-2.00*log(u1))*sin(2*M_PI*u2) );
00660 }
00661 
00662 void CamCalibration::HomogenousNormalizeVector( CvMat* mat ){
00663   if( cvGetDimSize( mat, 0 ) > 1 ){
00664     double d = cvmGet( mat, cvGetDimSize( mat, 0 )-1, 0 );
00665     if( d != 0 )
00666       for( int i = 0; i < cvGetDimSize( mat, 0 ); i++ )
00667         cvmSet( mat, i, 0, cvmGet( mat, i, 0 )/d );
00668   } else {
00669     double d = cvmGet( mat, 0, cvGetDimSize( mat, 1 )-1 );
00670     if( d != 0 )
00671       for( int i = 0; i < cvGetDimSize( mat, 1 ); i++ )
00672         cvmSet( mat, 0, i, cvmGet( mat, 0, i )/d );
00673   }
00674 }
00675 
00676 void CamCalibration::SetIntrinsicParam( int c, double f, double a, double u, double v ){
00677   v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.focal = f;
00678   v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.aspect = a;
00679   v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.u0  = u;
00680   v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.v0  = v;
00681 }
00682 
00683 void CamCalibration::SetPlaneObject( int c, int h, int p, double px[], double py[],
00684                                     double rx, double ry, double rz, double tx, double ty, double tz ){
00685                                       // Get pointer:
00686                                       s_struct_plane* s_plane_object = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object;
00687 
00688                                       // Delete old data if necessary:
00689                                       if( (*s_plane_object).px   ) delete (*s_plane_object).px;
00690                                       if( (*s_plane_object).py   ) delete (*s_plane_object).py;
00691                                       if( (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp.size() > 0 ){
00692                                         for( int i = 0; i < (int)(*s_plane_object).v_m_wp.size(); i++ )
00693                                           cvReleaseMat( &(*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i] );
00694                                         (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp.clear();
00695                                       }
00696                                       if( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp.size() > 0 ){
00697                                         for( int i = 0; i < (*s_plane_object).p; i++ )
00698                                           cvReleaseMat( &(*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i] );
00699                                         (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp.clear();
00700                                       }
00701 
00702                                       // Create new sized data structures:
00703                                       (*s_plane_object).px   = new double[p];
00704                                       (*s_plane_object).py   = new double[p];
00705                                       for( int i = 0; i < p; i++ ){
00706                                         (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp.push_back(cvCreateMat( 4, 1, CV_64FC1 ));
00707                                         (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp.push_back(cvCreateMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1 ));
00708                                       }
00709 
00710                                       // Set plane number:
00711                                       (*s_plane_object).p = p;
00712 
00713                                       // Set x/y coordinates on plane:
00714                                       for( int i = 0; i < p; i++ ){
00715                                         (*s_plane_object).px[i] = px[i];
00716                                         (*s_plane_object).py[i] = py[i];
00717                                       }
00718 
00719                                       // Set rotation translation:
00720                                       (*s_plane_object).rx = rx;
00721                                       (*s_plane_object).ry = ry;
00722                                       (*s_plane_object).rz = rz;
00723                                       (*s_plane_object).tx = tx;
00724                                       (*s_plane_object).ty = ty;
00725                                       (*s_plane_object).tz = tz;
00726 }
00727 
00728 void CamCalibration::Translate3DVector( CvMat* v, double x, double y, double z ){
00729   double a_T[] = { 1, 0, 0, -x,
00730     0, 1, 0, -y,
00731     0, 0, 1, -z,
00732     0, 0, 0,  1 };
00733   CvMat m_T  = cvMat( 4, 4, CV_64FC1, a_T );
00734   cvMatMul( &m_T, v, v );
00735 }
00736 
00737 void CamCalibration::Rotate3DVector( CvMat* v, double x, double y, double z ){
00738   x *= 2*M_PI/360.00;
00739   y *= 2*M_PI/360.00;
00740   z *= 2*M_PI/360.00;
00741   double a_Rx[] = {   1,    0,    0, 0,
00742     0,  cos(x), -sin(x), 0,
00743     0,  sin(x),  cos(x), 0, 
00744     0,    0,    0, 1 };
00745   double a_Ry[] = { cos(y),    0, -sin(y), 0,
00746     0,    1,    0, 0,
00747     sin(y),    0,  cos(y), 0,
00748     0,    0,    0, 1 };
00749   double a_Rz[] = { cos(z), -sin(z),    0, 0,
00750     sin(z),  cos(z),    0, 0,
00751     0,    0,       1, 0,
00752     0,    0,     0, 1 };
00753   CvMat m_Rx = cvMat( 4, 4, CV_64FC1, a_Rx );
00754   CvMat m_Ry = cvMat( 4, 4, CV_64FC1, a_Ry );
00755   CvMat m_Rz = cvMat( 4, 4, CV_64FC1, a_Rz );
00756   cvMatMul( &m_Rx, v, v );
00757   cvMatMul( &m_Ry, v, v );
00758   cvMatMul( &m_Rz, v, v );
00759 }
00760 
00761 void CamCalibration::ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( CvMat* RotTrans , CvMat* Rot, CvMat*Trans ){
00762   if( Rot != NULL ){
00763     cvmSet(   Rot, 0, 0, cvmGet( RotTrans, 0, 0 ) );
00764     cvmSet(   Rot, 0, 1, cvmGet( RotTrans, 0, 1 ) );
00765     cvmSet(   Rot, 0, 2, cvmGet( RotTrans, 0, 2 ) );
00766     cvmSet(   Rot, 1, 0, cvmGet( RotTrans, 1, 0 ) );
00767     cvmSet(   Rot, 1, 1, cvmGet( RotTrans, 1, 1 ) );
00768     cvmSet(   Rot, 1, 2, cvmGet( RotTrans, 1, 2 ) );
00769     cvmSet(   Rot, 2, 0, cvmGet( RotTrans, 2, 0 ) );
00770     cvmSet(   Rot, 2, 1, cvmGet( RotTrans, 2, 1 ) );
00771     cvmSet(   Rot, 2, 2, cvmGet( RotTrans, 2, 2 ) );
00772   }
00773   if( Trans != NULL ){
00774     cvmSet( Trans, 0, 0, -cvmGet( RotTrans, 0, 3 ) );
00775     cvmSet( Trans, 1, 0, -cvmGet( RotTrans, 1, 3 ) );
00776     cvmSet( Trans, 2, 0, -cvmGet( RotTrans, 2, 3 ) );
00777   }
00778 }
00779 
00780 void CamCalibration::ComposeRotationTranslationTo3x4Matrix( CvMat* RotTrans , CvMat* Rot, CvMat*Trans ){
00781   cvmSet( RotTrans, 0, 0, cvmGet( Rot, 0, 0 ) );
00782   cvmSet( RotTrans, 0, 1, cvmGet( Rot, 0, 1 ) );
00783   cvmSet( RotTrans, 0, 2, cvmGet( Rot, 0, 2 ) );
00784   cvmSet( RotTrans, 1, 0, cvmGet( Rot, 1, 0 ) );
00785   cvmSet( RotTrans, 1, 1, cvmGet( Rot, 1, 1 ) );
00786   cvmSet( RotTrans, 1, 2, cvmGet( Rot, 1, 2 ) );
00787   cvmSet( RotTrans, 2, 0, cvmGet( Rot, 2, 0 ) );
00788   cvmSet( RotTrans, 2, 1, cvmGet( Rot, 2, 1 ) );
00789   cvmSet( RotTrans, 2, 2, cvmGet( Rot, 2, 2 ) );
00790   cvmSet( RotTrans, 0, 3, -cvmGet( Trans, 0, 0 ) );
00791   cvmSet( RotTrans, 1, 3, -cvmGet( Trans, 1, 0 ) );
00792   cvmSet( RotTrans, 2, 3, -cvmGet( Trans, 2, 0 ) );
00793 }
00794 
00795 void CamCalibration::Mat3x4ToMat4x4( CvMat* m_A, CvMat* m_B ){
00796   for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00797     for( int j = 0; j < 4; j++ )
00798       cvmSet( m_B, i, j, cvmGet( m_A, i, j ) );
00799   cvmSet( m_B, 3, 0, 0 );
00800   cvmSet( m_B, 3, 1, 0 );
00801   cvmSet( m_B, 3, 2, 0 );
00802   cvmSet( m_B, 3, 3, 1 );
00803 }
00804 
00805 void CamCalibration::Mat4x4ToMat3x4( CvMat* m_A, CvMat* m_B ){
00806   for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00807     for( int j = 0; j < 4; j++ )
00808       cvmSet( m_B, i, j, cvmGet( m_A, i, j ) );
00809 }
00810 
00811 void CamCalibration::Mat3x4Mul( CvMat* m_A, CvMat* m_B, CvMat* m_C ){
00812   double a_A2[16]; CvMat m_A2 = cvMat( 4, 4, CV_64FC1, a_A2 );
00813   double a_B2[16]; CvMat m_B2 = cvMat( 4, 4, CV_64FC1, a_B2 );
00814   double a_C2[16]; CvMat m_C2 = cvMat( 4, 4, CV_64FC1, a_C2 );
00815   Mat3x4ToMat4x4( m_A, &m_A2 );
00816   Mat3x4ToMat4x4( m_B, &m_B2 );
00817   cvMatMul( &m_A2, &m_B2, &m_C2 );
00818   Mat4x4ToMat3x4( &m_C2, m_C );
00819 }
00820 
00821 void CamCalibration::Mat3x4Inverse( CvMat* m_A, CvMat* m_B ){
00822   double a_R[9]; CvMat m_R = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R );
00823   double a_T[3]; CvMat m_T = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T );
00824   ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( m_A, &m_R, &m_T );
00825   cvTranspose( &m_R, &m_R );
00826   cvGEMM( &m_R, &m_T, -1.00, NULL, +1.00, &m_T, 0 );
00827   ComposeRotationTranslationTo3x4Matrix( m_B, &m_R, &m_T );
00828 }
00829 
00830 void CamCalibration::CreatePlaneObjectWorldPoints( int c, int h ){
00831   s_struct_plane* s_plane_object = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object;
00832   for( int i = 0; i < (*s_plane_object).p; i++ ){
00833 
00834     // Create Point in plane Z=0:
00835     cvmSet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i], 0, 0, (*s_plane_object).px[i] );
00836     cvmSet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i], 1, 0, (*s_plane_object).py[i] );
00837     cvmSet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i], 2, 0, 0.0                     );
00838     cvmSet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i], 3, 0, 1.0                     );
00839 
00840     // Translate and Rotate the Point to its World Position:
00841     Rotate3DVector   (  (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i], 
00842       (*s_plane_object).rx,
00843       (*s_plane_object).ry,
00844       (*s_plane_object).rz      );
00845 
00846     Translate3DVector(  (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i], 
00847       (*s_plane_object).tx,
00848       (*s_plane_object).ty,
00849       (*s_plane_object).tz      );
00850   }
00851 }
00852 
00853 void CamCalibration::CreatePlaneObjectPlanePoints( int c, int h, double noise ){
00854   s_struct_plane* s_plane_object = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object;
00855   for( int i = 0; i < (*s_plane_object).p; i++ ){
00856     double a_P[12]; CvMat m_P = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_P );
00857     cvMatMul( GetM(m_calibration,c,h), GetM(m_rot_trans,c,h), &m_P );
00858     cvMatMul( &m_P, (*s_plane_object).v_m_wp[i], (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i] );
00859     HomogenousNormalizeVector( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i] );
00860     AddGaussianNoise( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i], noise );
00861   }
00862 }
00863 
00864 void CamCalibration::CreateWorldPlaneHomography( int c, int h, CvMat *ready ){
00865   s_struct_plane* s_plane_object = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object;
00866 
00867   homography* m_homography = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography = new homography();
00868   if (ready){
00869     cvCopy(ready, m_homography);
00870   } else {
00871     m_homography->set_match_number( (*s_plane_object).p );
00872 
00873     for( int i = 0; i < (*s_plane_object).p; i++ ){
00874       HomogenousNormalizeVector( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i] );
00875       m_homography->add_match( (float)(*s_plane_object).px[i],
00876                                (float)(*s_plane_object).py[i],
00877                                (float)cvmGet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i], 0, 0 ),
00878                                (float)cvmGet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[i], 1, 0 ) );
00879     }
00880     m_homography->estimate();
00881     m_homography->release_matches();
00882   }
00883 }
00884 
00885 double CamCalibration::VectorAngle( CvMat* v1, CvMat* v2, CvMat* v3, CvMat* v4 ){
00886   double x1 = cvmGet( v2, 0, 0 ) - cvmGet( v1, 0, 0 );
00887   double y1 = cvmGet( v2, 1, 0 ) - cvmGet( v1, 1, 0 );
00888   double x2 = cvmGet( v4, 0, 0 ) - cvmGet( v3, 0, 0 );
00889   double y2 = cvmGet( v4, 1, 0 ) - cvmGet( v3, 1, 0 );
00890   double a  = x1*x2+y1*y2;
00891   double b  = sqrt(pow(x1,2)+pow(y1,2)) * sqrt(pow(x2,2)+pow(y2,2));
00892   if( b != 0 )
00893     return acos(a/b);
00894   else
00895     return 0;
00896 }
00897 
00898 double CamCalibration::PointDistance( CvMat* v1, CvMat* v2 ){
00899   double x = cvmGet( v2, 0, 0 ) - cvmGet( v1, 0, 0 );
00900   double y = cvmGet( v2, 1, 0 ) - cvmGet( v1, 1, 0 );
00901   return sqrt(pow(x,2)+pow(y,2));
00902 }
00903 
00904 void CamCalibration::DeleteWorldPlaneHomography( int c, int h ){
00905   delete v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography;
00906   v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography = NULL;
00907 }
00908 
00909 bool CamCalibration::HomographySingular( int c, int h, double p_InitialGuess_a, double p_InitialGuess_b, double p_InitialGuess_c ){
00910 
00911   // Initialze 4 standard measure points:
00912   double a_w1[] = { -1, -1, 1 }; CvMat m_w1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_w1 );
00913   double a_w2[] = { -1,  1, 1 }; CvMat m_w2 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_w2 );
00914   double a_w3[] = {  1,  1, 1 }; CvMat m_w3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_w3 );
00915   double a_w4[] = {  1, -1, 1 }; CvMat m_w4 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_w4 );
00916   double a_p1[3]; CvMat m_p1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p1 );
00917   double a_p2[3]; CvMat m_p2 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p2 );
00918   double a_p3[3]; CvMat m_p3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p3 );
00919   double a_p4[3]; CvMat m_p4 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p4 );
00920   double a_h[9];  CvMat m_h  = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_h  );
00921 
00922   // Copy homography to matrix:
00923   for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00924     for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
00925       cvmSet( &m_h, i, j, cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography, i, j ) );
00926 
00927   // Project points using the homography:
00928   cvMatMul( &m_h, &m_w1, &m_p1 ); HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p1 );
00929   cvMatMul( &m_h, &m_w2, &m_p2 ); HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p2 );
00930   cvMatMul( &m_h, &m_w3, &m_p3 ); HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p3 );
00931   cvMatMul( &m_h, &m_w4, &m_p4 ); HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p4 );
00932 
00933   // Check for correct angles:
00934   double a1 = VectorAngle( &m_p1, &m_p4, &m_p1, &m_p2 );
00935   double a2 = VectorAngle( &m_p2, &m_p3, &m_p2, &m_p1 );
00936   double a3 = VectorAngle( &m_p3, &m_p4, &m_p3, &m_p2 );
00937   double a4 = VectorAngle( &m_p4, &m_p1, &m_p4, &m_p3 );
00938   double e1 = p_InitialGuess_a;
00939   double e2 = p_InitialGuess_b;
00940   if( a1 < e2 || (a1 > (M_PI/2.00) - e1 && a1 < (M_PI/2.00) + e1) || a1 > M_PI - e2 || 
00941     a2 < e2 || (a2 > (M_PI/2.00) - e1 && a2 < (M_PI/2.00) + e1) || a2 > M_PI - e2 || 
00942     a3 < e2 || (a3 > (M_PI/2.00) - e1 && a3 < (M_PI/2.00) + e1) || a3 > M_PI - e2 || 
00943     a4 < e2 || (a4 > (M_PI/2.00) - e1 && a4 < (M_PI/2.00) + e1) || a4 > M_PI - e2   ){
00944       return true;
00945   }
00946 
00947   // Check for correct distances:
00948   double d1 = PointDistance( &m_p1, &m_p2 );
00949   double d2 = PointDistance( &m_p2, &m_p3 );
00950   double d3 = PointDistance( &m_p3, &m_p4 );
00951   double d4 = PointDistance( &m_p4, &m_p1 );
00952   double d5 = (d1+d2+d3+d4)/4.00;
00953   double e3 = p_InitialGuess_c;
00954   if( d1 < d5*e3 || d2 < d5*e3 || d3 < d5*e3 || d4 < d5*e3 ){
00955     return true;
00956   }
00957 
00958   return false;
00959 }
00960 
00961 double CamCalibration::GetFrobeniusDistance( int c, int h1, int h2 ){
00962 
00963   // First normalize to get comparable values:
00964   double na = 0;
00965   double nb = 0;
00966   for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00967     for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ ){
00968       na += pow(cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h1]->m_homography, i, j ),2);
00969       nb += pow(cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h2]->m_homography, i, j ),2);
00970     }
00971     na /= 10000.00;
00972     nb /= 10000.00;
00973 
00974     // Then build Frobenius norm:
00975     double sum = 0;
00976     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00977       for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ ){
00978         double a = cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h1]->m_homography, i, j )/na;
00979         double b = cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h2]->m_homography, i, j )/nb;
00980         sum += pow( a - b, 2 );
00981       }
00982       return sum;
00983 }
00984 
00985 bool CamCalibration::GetDistalHomographiesForCalibration( int c, int *h1, int *h2 ){
00986   double dist = 0;
00987   for( int i = 0; i < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); i++ )
00988     for( int j = 0; j < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); j++ )
00989       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[i]->m_homography &&
00990         v_camera[c]->v_homography[j]->m_homography    ){
00991           double dnew = GetFrobeniusDistance( c, i, j );
00992           if( dnew > dist ){
00993             dist = dnew;
00994             *h1  = i;
00995             *h2  = j;
00996           }
00997       }
00998 
00999       if( dist > 0 )
01000         return true;
01001       else
01002         return false;
01003 }
01004 
01005 bool CamCalibration::ExtractIntrinsicParameters( int c, double p_InitialGuess_a, double p_InitialGuess_b, double p_InitialGuess_c ){
01006   int homs = 0;
01007   for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
01008     if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
01009       if( !HomographySingular( c, h, p_InitialGuess_a, p_InitialGuess_b, p_InitialGuess_c ) )
01010         homs++;
01011 
01012   // Check if enough homographies to calculate intrinsic parameters:
01013   if( homs < 2 ){
01014     printf( "ERROR: Could not extract intrinsic parameters of camera %i\n", c );
01015     printf( "       because there are fewer than 2 views available!\n" );
01016     return false;
01017   }
01018 
01019   int rows_of_a = 2*homs;
01020   CvMat* m_A = cvCreateMat( rows_of_a, 4, CV_64FC1 );
01021   CvMat* m_X = cvCreateMat(         4, 1, CV_64FC1 );
01022   CvMat* m_B = cvCreateMat( rows_of_a, 1, CV_64FC1 );
01023 
01024   homs = 0;
01025   for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
01026     if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
01027       if( !HomographySingular( c, h, p_InitialGuess_a, p_InitialGuess_b, p_InitialGuess_c ) ){
01028 
01029         // Get pointer:
01030         homography* m_homography = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography;
01031 
01032         double v_h11 = m_homography->cvmGet( 0, 0 );
01033         double v_h12 = m_homography->cvmGet( 0, 1 );
01034         double v_h21 = m_homography->cvmGet( 1, 0 );
01035         double v_h22 = m_homography->cvmGet( 1, 1 );
01036         double v_h31 = m_homography->cvmGet( 2, 0 );
01037         double v_h32 = m_homography->cvmGet( 2, 1 );
01038 
01039         // First row:
01040         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2,   0, (pow(v_h21,2)-pow(v_h22,2)  ));
01041         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2,   1, 2*( v_h11*v_h31-v_h12*v_h32 ));
01042         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2,   2, 2*( v_h21*v_h31-v_h22*v_h32 ));
01043         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2,   3, (pow(v_h31,2)-pow(v_h32,2) ));
01044         cvmSet( m_B, homs*2,   0, (pow(v_h12,2)-pow(v_h11,2) ));
01045 
01046         // Second row:
01047         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2+1, 0, (v_h22*v_h21 )      );
01048         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2+1, 1, (v_h11*v_h32 + v_h12*v_h31 ));
01049         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2+1, 2, (v_h32*v_h21 + v_h22*v_h31 ));
01050         cvmSet( m_A, homs*2+1, 3, (v_h32*v_h31)    );
01051         cvmSet( m_B, homs*2+1, 0, (-v_h11*v_h12)    );
01052 
01053         homs++;
01054       }
01055 
01056       // Solve least squares
01057       cvSolve( m_A, m_B, m_X, CV_SVD );
01058 
01059       // Grab omegas out of X
01060       double v_w22 = cvmGet( m_X, 0, 0 );
01061       double v_w13 = cvmGet( m_X, 1, 0 );
01062       double v_w23 = cvmGet( m_X, 2, 0 );
01063       double v_w33 = cvmGet( m_X, 3, 0 );
01064 
01065       // Release temporary matices:
01066       cvReleaseMat( &m_A );
01067       cvReleaseMat( &m_X );
01068       cvReleaseMat( &m_B );
01069 
01070       // Set the estimated intrinsic parameters if possible:
01071       double f2 = (v_w22*v_w33-v_w22*pow(v_w13,2)-pow(v_w23,2))/pow(v_w22,2);
01072       double a2 =  v_w22;
01073       if( a2 < 0 || f2 < 0 ){
01074         printf("ERROR: Intrinsic parameters of camera %i could not be estimated (complex values)!\n",c);
01075         return false;
01076       }
01077 
01078       // Assign results:
01079       v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.focal  =   sqrt(f2);
01080       v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.aspect =   sqrt(a2);
01081       v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.u0  =  -v_w13;
01082       v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.v0  =  -v_w23/v_w22;
01083 
01084       printf( "Estimated camera %i (%03d views): %f %f %f %f\n", c, homs,
01085         v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.focal, v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.aspect,
01086         v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.u0, v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.v0   );
01087 
01088       return true;
01089 }
01090

01244 
01245 void CamCalibration::CreateCalibrationMatrixFromIntrinsicParameters( int c ){
01246   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 0, 0, v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.aspect*v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.focal );
01247   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 0, 1, 0.00               );
01248   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 0, 2, v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.u0         );
01249   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 1, 0, 0.00               );
01250   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 1, 1, v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.focal        );
01251   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 1, 2, v_camera[c]->s_intrinsic.v0         );
01252   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 2, 0, 0.00               );
01253   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 2, 1, 0.00               );
01254   cvmSet( GetM(m_calibration,c,0), 2, 2, 1.00               );
01255 }
01256 
01257 void CamCalibration::CreateEstimatedCalibrationMatrixFromEstimatedIntrinsicParameters( int c ){
01258   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 0, 0, v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.aspect*v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.focal );
01259   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 0, 1, 0.00               );
01260   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 0, 2, v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.u0         );
01261   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 1, 0, 0.00               );
01262   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 1, 1, v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.focal        );
01263   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 1, 2, v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.v0         );
01264   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 2, 0, 0.00               );
01265   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 2, 1, 0.00               );
01266   cvmSet( GetM(m_estim_calib,c,0), 2, 2, 1.00               );
01267 }
01268 
01269 void CamCalibration::CreateEstimatedInverseCalibrationMatrixFromEstimatedIntrinsicParameters( int c ){
01270   double tau = v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.aspect;
01271   double f   = v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.focal;
01272   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 0, 0, 1.00/(tau*f) );
01273   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 0, 1, 0.00               );
01274   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 0, 2, -(v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.u0)/(tau*f)      );
01275   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 1, 0, 0.00               );
01276   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 1, 1, 1.00/f              );
01277   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 1, 2, -(v_camera[c]->s_estim_int.v0)/f        );
01278   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 2, 0, 0.00               );
01279   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 2, 1, 0.00               );
01280   cvmSet( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), 2, 2, 1.00               );
01281 }
01282 
01283 void CamCalibration::CreateRotationTranslationMatrixFromInverseCalibrationMatrixAndHomography( int c, int h ){
01284   int i;
01285 
01286   // Get pointer to homography:
01287   homography* m_homography = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography;
01288 
01289   if( m_homography ){
01290 
01291     // Vectors holding columns of H and R:
01292     double a_H1[3];
01293     CvMat  m_H1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_H1 );
01294     for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) cvmSet( &m_H1, i, 0, cvmGet( m_homography, i, 0 ) );
01295 
01296     double a_H2[3];
01297     CvMat  m_H2 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_H2 );
01298     for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) cvmSet( &m_H2, i, 0, cvmGet( m_homography, i, 1 ) );
01299 
01300     double a_H3[3];
01301     CvMat  m_H3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_H3 );
01302     for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) cvmSet( &m_H3, i, 0, cvmGet( m_homography, i, 2 ) );
01303 
01304     double a_CinvH1[3];
01305     CvMat  m_CinvH1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_CinvH1 );
01306 
01307     double a_R1[3];
01308     CvMat  m_R1 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_R1 );
01309 
01310     double a_R2[3];
01311     CvMat  m_R2 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_R2 );
01312 
01313     double a_R3[3];
01314     CvMat  m_R3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_R3 );
01315 
01316     // The rotation matrix:
01317     double a_R[9];
01318     CvMat  m_R = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R );
01319 
01320     // The translation vector:
01321     double a_T[3];
01322     CvMat  m_T = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T );
01323 
01325     // Create norming factor lambda:
01326     cvGEMM( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), &m_H1, 1, NULL, 0, &m_CinvH1, 0 );
01327 
01328     // Search next orthonormal matrix:
01329     if( cvNorm( &m_CinvH1, NULL, CV_L2, NULL ) != 0 ){
01330       double lambda = 1.00/cvNorm( &m_CinvH1, NULL, CV_L2, NULL );
01331 
01332       // Create normalized R1 & R2:
01333       cvGEMM( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), &m_H1, lambda, NULL, 0, &m_R1, 0 );
01334       cvGEMM( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), &m_H2, lambda, NULL, 0, &m_R2, 0 );
01335 
01336       // Get R3 orthonormal to R1 and R2:
01337       cvCrossProduct( &m_R1, &m_R2, &m_R3 );
01338 
01339       // Put the rotation column vectors in the rotation matrix:
01340       for( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ){
01341         cvmSet( &m_R, i, 0,  cvmGet( &m_R1, i, 0 ) );
01342         cvmSet( &m_R, i, 1,  cvmGet( &m_R2, i, 0 ) );
01343         cvmSet( &m_R, i, 2,  cvmGet( &m_R3, i, 0 ) );
01344       }
01345 
01346       // Calculate Translation Vector T (- because of its definition):
01347       cvGEMM( GetM(m_estinvcalib,c,0), &m_H3, -lambda, NULL, 0, &m_T, 0 );
01348 
01349       // Transformation of R into - in Frobenius sense - next orthonormal matrix:
01350       double a_W[9]; CvMat  m_W  = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_W  );
01351       double a_U[9]; CvMat  m_U  = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_U  );
01352       double a_Vt[9]; CvMat  m_Vt = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_Vt );
01353       cvSVD( &m_R, &m_W, &m_U, &m_Vt, CV_SVD_MODIFY_A | CV_SVD_V_T );
01354       cvMatMul( &m_U, &m_Vt, &m_R );
01355 
01356       // Put the rotation matrix and the translation vector together:
01357       ComposeRotationTranslationTo3x4Matrix( GetM(m_estim_r_t,c,h), &m_R, &m_T );
01358     }
01359   }
01360 }
01361 
01362 void CamCalibration::CreateRotationTranslationIdentityMatrix( int c ){
01363   for( int i=0; i<3; i++ )
01364     for( int j=0; j<4; j++ )
01365       cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,0), i, j, 0.0 );
01366   cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,0), 0, 0, 1.0 );
01367   cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,1), 1, 1, 1.0 );
01368   cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,2), 2, 2, 1.0 );
01369 }
01370 
01371 void CamCalibration::CreateRotationTranslationMatrix( int c, double rx, double ry, double rz,
01372                                                      double tx, double ty, double tz ){
01373                                                        rx *= 2*M_PI/360.00;
01374                                                        ry *= 2*M_PI/360.00;
01375                                                        rz *= 2*M_PI/360.00;
01376                                                        double a_R[]  = {    1,    0,     0,
01377                                                          0,    1,     0,
01378                                                          0,    0,        1 };
01379                                                        double a_Rx[] = {    1,    0,     0,
01380                                                          0, cos(rx), -sin(rx),
01381                                                          0,    sin(rx),  cos(rx) };
01382                                                        double a_Ry[] = { cos(ry),    0, -sin(ry),
01383                                                          0,    1,     0,
01384                                                          sin(ry),    0,   cos(ry) };
01385                                                        double a_Rz[] = { cos(rz), -sin(rz),      0,
01386                                                          sin(rz),  cos(rz),     0,
01387                                                          0,    0,        1 };
01388                                                        CvMat m_R  = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R  );
01389                                                        CvMat m_Rx = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_Rx );
01390                                                        CvMat m_Ry = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_Ry );
01391                                                        CvMat m_Rz = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_Rz );
01392                                                        cvMatMul( &m_Rx, &m_R, &m_R );
01393                                                        cvMatMul( &m_Ry, &m_R, &m_R );
01394                                                        cvMatMul( &m_Rz, &m_R, &m_R );
01395 
01396                                                        for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01397                                                          for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
01398                                                            cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,0), i, j, cvmGet( &m_R, i, j ) );
01399 
01400                                                        cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,0), 0, 3, -tx );
01401                                                        cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,0), 1, 3, -ty );
01402                                                        cvmSet( GetM(m_rot_trans,c,0), 2, 3, -tz );
01403 }
01404 
01405 void CamCalibration::CreateEstimated3ChainMatrixRT( int h1, int c2, int h2, int c1 ){
01406   double a_RTinv[12]; CvMat m_RTinv = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_RTinv );
01407   CvMat *m_RT11 = v_camera[c1]->v_homography[h1]->m_estim_r_t_matrix;
01408   CvMat *m_RT12 = v_camera[c1]->v_homography[h2]->m_estim_r_t_matrix;
01409   CvMat *m_RT21 = v_camera[c2]->v_homography[h1]->m_estim_r_t_matrix;
01410   CvMat *m_RT22 = v_camera[c2]->v_homography[h2]->m_estim_r_t_matrix;
01411   Mat3x4Inverse( m_RT22, &m_RTinv );
01412   Mat3x4Mul( m_RT21, &m_RTinv, m_RT11 );
01413   Mat3x4Mul( m_RT11,  m_RT12,  m_RT11 );
01414 }
01415 
01416 void CamCalibration::CreateEstimatedOptimalHomographyMatrixRT( int h1, int c1, int h2 ){
01417   double a_RTinv[12]; CvMat m_RTinv = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_RTinv );
01418   CvMat *m_RT11 = v_camera[c1]->v_homography[h1]->m_estim_r_t_matrix;
01419   CvMat *m_RT12 = v_camera[c1]->v_homography[h2]->m_estim_r_t_matrix;
01420   Mat3x4Inverse( m_RT12, &m_RTinv );
01421   s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h1] = cvCreateMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1 );
01422   Mat3x4Mul( &m_RTinv, m_RT11, s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h1] );
01423 }
01424 
01425 void CamCalibration::CreateEstimatedOptimalCameraMatrixC( int c ){
01426   s_optimal.v_camera_c[c] = cvCloneMat( v_camera[c]->m_estim_calib_matrix );
01427 }
01428 
01429 void CamCalibration::CreateEstimatedOptimalCameraMatrixRT( int c, int h ){
01430   s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c] = cvCloneMat( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_estim_r_t_matrix );
01431 }
01432 
01433 bool CamCalibration::CreateMatrixCH(){
01434 
01435   // Release old CV matrix:
01436   if( m_CH )
01437     cvReleaseMat( &m_CH );
01438 
01439   m_CH  = cvCreateMat( v_camera.size(), v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(), CV_64FC1 );
01440   s_optimal.c_max = -1; s_optimal.h_max = -1;
01441 
01442   // Search for all existing connections:
01443   int cnt = 0;
01444   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )
01445     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ ){
01446       cvmSet( m_CH, c, h, v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ? 1 : 0 );
01447       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
01448         cnt++;
01449     }
01450 
01451     printf("\nOriginal connection matrix (connections: %i):\n",cnt);
01452     showmatrix_ch(*m_CH);
01453 
01454     // Find plane with most camera connections:
01455     int cmax = -1; int hmax = -1; int max = -1;
01456     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); h++ ){
01457       int i = 0;
01458       for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )
01459         if( cvmGet( m_CH, c, h ) == 1 )
01460           i++;
01461       if( i > max ){
01462         max  = i;
01463         hmax = h;
01464       }
01465     }
01466 
01467     // Find camera inside plane with most plane connections:
01468     max = -1;
01469     for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ ){
01470       if( cvmGet( m_CH, c, hmax ) == 1 ){
01471         int i = 0;
01472         for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
01473           if( cvmGet( m_CH, c, h ) == 1 )
01474             i++;
01475         if( i > max ){
01476           max  = i;
01477           cmax = c;
01478         }
01479       }
01480     }
01481 
01482     // If no maximum row or column found return false:
01483     if( cmax == -1 || hmax == -1 ){
01484       cvReleaseMat( &m_CH );
01485       m_CH = NULL;
01486       if( cmax == -1 )
01487         printf("ERROR: Camera with maximal plane connections could not be estimated!\n");
01488       else
01489         printf("ERROR: Plane with maximal camera connections could not be estimated!\n");
01490       return false;
01491     }
01492 
01493     bool big_briged;
01494     do{
01495       big_briged = false;
01496       for( int c1 = 0; c1 < (int)v_camera.size(); c1++ ){
01497         for( int h1 = 0; h1 < (int)v_camera[c1]->v_homography.size(); h1++ ){
01498           if( cvmGet( m_CH, c1, h1 ) == 0 ){
01499             bool briged = false;
01500             for( int c2 = 0; c2 < (int)v_camera.size(); c2++ ){
01501               for( int h2 = 0; h2 < (int)v_camera[c2]->v_homography.size(); h2++ ){
01502                 if( (cvmGet( m_CH, c1, h2 ) == 1 || cvmGet( m_CH, c1, h2 ) == 2) && 
01503                   (cvmGet( m_CH, c2, h1 ) == 1 || cvmGet( m_CH, c2, h1 ) == 2) && 
01504                   (cvmGet( m_CH, c2, h2 ) == 1 || cvmGet( m_CH, c2, h2 ) == 2) &&
01505                   c1 != c2 && h1 != h2 ){  
01506 
01507                     briged     = true;
01508                     big_briged = true;
01509                     cvmSet( m_CH, c1, h1, 1 );
01510                     CreateEstimated3ChainMatrixRT( h1, c2, h2, c1 );   
01511                 }
01512                 if( briged ) break;
01513               }
01514               if( briged ) break;
01515             }
01516           }
01517         }
01518       }
01519     } while( big_briged );
01520 
01521     s_optimal.c_max = cmax;
01522     s_optimal.h_max = hmax;
01523 
01524     printf("\nNew connection matrix (cmax: %i, hmax: %i, connections: %i):\n",cmax,hmax,cnt);
01525     showmatrix_ch(*m_CH);
01526 
01527     // Check if all cameras are connected:
01528     for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ ){
01529       if( cvmGet( m_CH, c, hmax ) == 0 ){
01530         printf("ERROR: Not enough links to connect camera %i to main camera %i!\n",c,cmax);
01531         return false;
01532       }
01533     }
01534 
01535     return true;
01536 }
01537 
01538 void CamCalibration::ReleaseOptimalCameraStructure(){
01539   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_c.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_camera_c[i]);
01540   s_optimal.v_camera_c.clear();
01541   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[i]);
01542   s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.clear();
01543   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian[i]);
01544   s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian.clear();
01545   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[i]);
01546   s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.clear();
01547   for( int i = 0; i < (int)s_optimal.v_homography_r_t_jacobian.size(); i++ ) cvReleaseMat(&s_optimal.v_homography_r_t_jacobian[i]);
01548   s_optimal.v_homography_r_t_jacobian.clear();
01549 }
01550 
01551 bool CamCalibration::CreateOptimalCameraStructure(){
01552   ReleaseOptimalCameraStructure();
01553 
01554   if( !CreateMatrixCH() ){
01555     printf("ERROR: Connection matrix could not be constructed!\n");
01556     return false;
01557   }
01558 
01559   // Create all camera & calibration matrices:
01560   for( int c = 0; c < m_CH->height; c++ ){
01561     s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.push_back( NULL );
01562     CreateEstimatedOptimalCameraMatrixRT( c, s_optimal.h_max );
01563     s_optimal.v_camera_c.push_back( NULL );
01564     CreateEstimatedOptimalCameraMatrixC( c );
01565     s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian.push_back( cvCreateMat( 3, 9, CV_64FC1 ) );
01566   }
01567 
01568   // Create all possible plane matrices (others = NULL):
01569   for( int h = 0; h < m_CH->width; h++ ){
01570     s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.push_back( NULL );
01571     if( cvmGet( m_CH, s_optimal.c_max, h ) == 1 || cvmGet( m_CH, s_optimal.c_max, h ) == 2 )
01572       CreateEstimatedOptimalHomographyMatrixRT( h, s_optimal.c_max, s_optimal.h_max );
01573     s_optimal.v_homography_r_t_jacobian.push_back( cvCreateMat( 3, 9, CV_64FC1 ) );
01574   }
01575 
01576   return true;
01577 }
01578 
01579 struct ProjObs : ls_minimizer2::observation
01580 {
01581   double target[2];
01582   int cam;
01583   int hom;
01584   int point;
01585   static int parameterNumber;
01586   ProjObs() {
01587     b = target;
01588   }
01589   virtual int get_nb_measures() const { return 2; };
01590   virtual void eval_func(const double *params, double *f, double *J, void **user_data) const;
01591 };
01592 
01593 int ProjObs::parameterNumber=0;
01594 
01595 void CamCalibration::updateCB( double *params , void **user_data){
01596   CamCalibration *cam = (CamCalibration*) *user_data;
01597 
01598   // Pass parameters to global parameter array:
01599   int parameter_number = cam->GetParameterNumber();
01600   for( int i = 0; i < parameter_number; i++ )
01601     cam->v_opt_param[i] = params[i];
01602 
01603   // Update the optimization structure:
01604   cam->SetParameterSetToOptimalStructure();
01605   cam->PrintOptimizedResultErrors(params);
01606 }
01607 
01608 //void CamCalibration::projFunc( double *x, double *params, int na, double *f, double *grad, int *ind, LsqData *Data ){
01609 void ProjObs::eval_func(const double *params, double *f, double *J, void **user_data) const {
01610   CamCalibration *cam = (CamCalibration*) *user_data;
01611 
01612   // Unpack arguments:
01613   int c     = this->cam;
01614   int h     = hom;
01615 
01616   double *grad0 = J;
01617   double *grad1 = J+parameterNumber;
01618 
01619   // Project the point (CRTp) and set f:
01620   double a_p[4];  double a_p3[3]; double a_p4[3];
01621   double a_RT[12]; CvMat m_RT = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_RT );
01622   a_p[0] = cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->px[point]; a_p[2] = 0;
01623   a_p[1] = cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->py[point]; a_p[3] = 1;
01624   CvMat m_p  = cvMat( 4, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p );  // plane point (flat)
01625   CvMat m_p3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p3 ); // eye point 2
01626   CvMat m_p4 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p4 ); // image point
01627   cam->Mat3x4Mul( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], cam->s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], &m_RT );
01628   cvMatMul( &m_RT, &m_p, &m_p3 );
01629   cvMatMul( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], &m_p3, &m_p4 );
01630   cam->HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p4 );
01631   f[0] = cvmGet( &m_p4, 0, 0 );
01632   f[1] = cvmGet( &m_p4, 1, 0 );
01633 
01634   int gc = 0;
01635   if( J ){
01636 
01637     // Gradient of camera calibration parameters:
01638     for( int g_c = 0; g_c < (int)cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c.size(); g_c++ ){
01639       if( g_c == c ){
01640         grad0[gc] = cvmGet(&m_p3,0,0)/cvmGet(&m_p3,2,0);
01641         grad0[gc+1] = 0;
01642         grad0[gc+2] = 1;
01643         grad0[gc+3] = 0;
01644         grad1[gc] = 0;
01645         grad1[gc+1] = cvmGet(&m_p3,1,0)/cvmGet(&m_p3,2,0);
01646         grad1[gc+2] = 0;
01647         grad1[gc+3] = 1;
01648       } else {
01649         grad0[gc] = 0;
01650         grad0[gc+1] = 0;
01651         grad0[gc+2] = 0;
01652         grad0[gc+3] = 0;
01653         grad1[gc] = 0;
01654         grad1[gc+1] = 0;
01655         grad1[gc+2] = 0;
01656         grad1[gc+3] = 0;
01657       }
01658       gc+=4;
01659     }
01660 
01661     double a_R1[9];  CvMat m_R1    = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R1 );
01662     double a_T1[3];  CvMat m_T1   = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T1 );
01663     double a_R2[9];  CvMat m_R2    = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R2 );
01664     double a_T2[3];  CvMat m_T2   = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T2 );
01665     cam->ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c],     &m_R1, &m_T1 );
01666     cam->ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( cam->s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], &m_R2, &m_T2 );
01667 
01668     double R1[3][3];
01669     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01670       for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
01671         R1[i][j] = cvmGet( &m_R1, i, j );
01672 
01673     double R2[3][3];
01674     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01675       for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
01676         R2[i][j] = cvmGet( &m_R2, i, j );
01677 
01678     double cgret[24];
01679     double uv[2];
01680 
01681     twomat_gradian ( params[c*4+0],
01682       params[c*4+1],
01683       params[c*4+2],
01684       params[c*4+3],
01685       R1,
01686       -cvmGet( &m_T1, 0, 0 ),
01687       -cvmGet( &m_T1, 1, 0 ),
01688       -cvmGet( &m_T1, 2, 0 ),
01689       cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian[c],
01690       R2,
01691       -cvmGet( &m_T2, 0, 0 ),
01692       -cvmGet( &m_T2, 1, 0 ),
01693       -cvmGet( &m_T2, 2, 0 ),
01694       cam->s_optimal.v_homography_r_t_jacobian[h],
01695       a_p,
01696       cgret, uv );
01697 
01698     // Gradient of camera RT matrices:
01699     for( int g_c = 0; g_c < (int)cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.size(); g_c++ ){
01700       if( g_c == c ){
01701         for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01702           grad0[gc+i] = cgret[i+3];
01703         for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01704           grad0[gc+3+i] = cgret[i];
01705         for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01706           grad1[gc+i] = cgret[12+i+3];
01707         for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01708           grad1[gc+3+i] = cgret[12+i];
01709       } else {
01710         for( int i = 0; i < 6; i++ ) {
01711           grad0[gc+i] = 0;
01712           grad1[gc+i] = 0;
01713         }
01714       }
01715       gc+=6;
01716     }
01717 
01718     // Gradient of homography RT matrices:
01719     for( int g_h = 0; g_h < (int)cam->s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.size(); g_h++ ){
01720 
01721       // If not plane itself (Identity) and plane is connected to main plane:
01722       if( g_h != cam->s_optimal.h_max && cvmGet( cam->m_CH, cam->s_optimal.c_max, g_h ) == 1 ){
01723         if( g_h == h ){
01724           for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01725             grad0[gc+i] = cgret[6+i+3];
01726           for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01727             grad0[gc+i+3] = cgret[6+i];
01728           for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01729             grad1[gc+i] = cgret[12+6+i+3];
01730           for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
01731             grad1[gc+i+3] = cgret[12+6+i];
01732         } else {
01733           for( int i = 0; i < 6; i++ ) {
01734             grad0[gc+i] = 0;
01735             grad1[gc+i] = 0;
01736           }
01737         }
01738         gc+=6;
01739       } 
01740     }
01741   }
01742 }
01743 
01744 int CamCalibration::GetParameterNumber(){
01745   int i = 0;
01746 
01747   for( int c = 0; c < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.size(); c++ )
01748     i+=6;
01749 
01750   for( int h = 0; h < (int)s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.size(); h++ )
01751     // If connection found and not plane itself (Identity)
01752     if( h != s_optimal.h_max && cvmGet( m_CH, s_optimal.c_max, h ) == 1 /*|| cvmGet( m_CH, s_optimal.c_max, h ) == 2)*/ )
01753       i+=6;
01754 
01755   return 4*(int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.size()+i;
01756 }
01757 
01758 int CamCalibration::GetObservationNumber(){
01759   int i = 0;
01760   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )
01761     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
01762       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
01763         i += v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->p*2;
01764   return i;
01765 }
01766 
01767 void CamCalibration::GetParameterSetFromOptimalStructure(){
01768   // Clear old vector:
01769   v_opt_param.clear();
01770 
01771   // Pack camera calibration parameters:
01772   for( int c = 0; c < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_c.size(); c++ ){
01773     v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 0, 0 ) ); // f
01774     v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 1, 1 ) ); // g
01775     v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 0, 2 ) ); // u0
01776     v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 1, 2 ) ); // v0
01777   }
01778 
01779   double a_R[9];  CvMat m_R    = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1, a_R );
01780   double a_r[3];  CvMat m_r    = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_r );
01781   double a_T[3];  CvMat m_T   = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_T );
01782 
01783   // Pack Camera RT matrices:
01784   for( int c = 0; c < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.size(); c++ ){
01785     ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], &m_R, &m_T);
01786     v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 0, 0 ) );
01787     v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 1, 0 ) );
01788     v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 2, 0 ) );
01789     cvRodrigues2( &m_R, &m_r, 0 );
01790     v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 0, 0 ) );
01791     v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 1, 0 ) );
01792     v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 2, 0 ) );
01793   }
01794 
01795   // Pack Homography RT matrices:
01796   for( int h = 0; h < (int)s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.size(); h++ ){
01797     // Pack to arguments if not reference plane itself (Identity)
01798     if( h != s_optimal.h_max && cvmGet( m_CH, s_optimal.c_max, h ) == 1 ){
01799       ExtractRotationTranslationFrom3x4Matrix( s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], &m_R, &m_T);
01800       v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 0, 0 ) );
01801       v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 1, 0 ) );
01802       v_opt_param.push_back( -cvmGet( &m_T, 2, 0 ) );
01803       cvRodrigues2( &m_R, &m_r, 0 );
01804       v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 0, 0 ) );
01805       v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 1, 0 ) );
01806       v_opt_param.push_back( cvmGet( &m_r, 2, 0 ) );
01807     }
01808   }
01809 }
01810 
01811 static CvPoint cvPoint(double a, double b)
01812 {
01813   return cvPoint((int)a, (int)b);
01814 }
01815 
01816 void CamCalibration::SetParameterSetToOptimalStructure(){
01817   int i = 0;
01818 
01819   // Unpack camera calibration parameters:
01820   for( int c = 0; c < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_c.size(); c++ ){
01821     cvmSet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 0, 0, v_opt_param[i++] ); // f
01822     cvmSet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 1, 1, v_opt_param[i++] ); // g
01823     cvmSet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 0, 2, v_opt_param[i++] ); // u0
01824     cvmSet( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], 1, 2, v_opt_param[i++] ); // v0
01825   }
01826 
01827   double a_R[9];  CvMat m_R    = cvMat( 3, 3, CV_64FC1,     a_R );
01828   double a_r[3];  CvMat m_r    = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1,     a_r );
01829   double a_T[3];  CvMat m_T   = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1,     a_T );
01830 
01831   // Unpack Camera RT matrices:
01832   for( int c = 0; c < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_r_t.size(); c++ ){
01833     cvmSet( &m_T, 0, 0, -v_opt_param[i++] );
01834     cvmSet( &m_T, 1, 0, -v_opt_param[i++] );
01835     cvmSet( &m_T, 2, 0, -v_opt_param[i++] );
01836     cvmSet( &m_r, 0, 0,  v_opt_param[i++] );
01837     cvmSet( &m_r, 1, 0,  v_opt_param[i++] );
01838     cvmSet( &m_r, 2, 0,  v_opt_param[i++] );
01839     cvRodrigues2( &m_r, &m_R, s_optimal.v_camera_r_t_jacobian[c] );
01840     ComposeRotationTranslationTo3x4Matrix( s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], &m_R, &m_T);
01841   }
01842 
01843   // Unpack Homography RT matrices:
01844   for( int h = 0; h < (int)s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.size(); h++ ){
01845     // Pack to arguments if not plane itself (Identity)
01846     if( h != s_optimal.h_max && (cvmGet( m_CH, s_optimal.c_max, h ) == 1 || cvmGet( m_CH, s_optimal.c_max, h ) == 1) ){
01847       cvmSet( &m_T, 0, 0, -v_opt_param[i++] );
01848       cvmSet( &m_T, 1, 0, -v_opt_param[i++] );
01849       cvmSet( &m_T, 2, 0, -v_opt_param[i++] );
01850       cvmSet( &m_r, 0, 0,  v_opt_param[i++] );
01851       cvmSet( &m_r, 1, 0,  v_opt_param[i++] );
01852       cvmSet( &m_r, 2, 0,  v_opt_param[i++] );
01853       cvRodrigues2( &m_r, &m_R, s_optimal.v_homography_r_t_jacobian[h] );
01854       ComposeRotationTranslationTo3x4Matrix( s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], &m_R, &m_T);
01855     }
01856   }
01857 }
01858 
01859 void CamCalibration::PlotPointsToImagesAfterOptimization(){
01860   char  file_name[200];
01861   IplImage * image[5]; // TODO: flexibel!!
01862   int cnt = 0;
01863   for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[0]->v_homography.size(); h++ ){
01864     for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ ){
01865       if( cvmGet( m_CH, c, h ) == 1 ){
01866         sprintf(file_name,"E:\\andreas_camcal_16_12_2005\\cam%02d%04d.bmp",c+1,h+2048); //TODO: 2048!!!!!
01867         if( image[c] = cvLoadImage( file_name, 1 ) ){         
01868           // Draw box:
01869           FILE * boxfile;
01870           if( (boxfile = fopen( "box.txt", "r+t" )) != NULL ){
01871             for( int j = 0; j < 6; j++ ){
01872               double p[4][2];
01873               for( int i = 0; (i < 4 && j < 2) || i < 2; i++ ){
01874                 double a_p[4];  double a_p3[3]; double a_p4[3];
01875                 double a_RT[12]; CvMat m_RT = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_RT );
01876                 float x, y, z;
01877                 fscanf( boxfile, "%f %f %f\n", &x, &y, &z );
01878                 a_p[0] = x; a_p[1] = y; a_p[2] = z; a_p[3] = 1;
01879                 CvMat m_p  = cvMat( 4, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p );  // plane point (flat)
01880                 CvMat m_p3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p3 ); // eye point 2
01881                 CvMat m_p4 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p4 ); // image point
01882                 Mat3x4Mul( s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], &m_RT );
01883                 cvMatMul( &m_RT, &m_p, &m_p3 );
01884                 cvMatMul( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], &m_p3, &m_p4 );
01885                 HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p4 );
01886                 p[i][0] = cvmGet( &m_p4, 0, 0 );
01887                 p[i][1] = cvmGet( &m_p4, 1, 0 );
01888               }
01889               CvScalar color = CV_RGB ( 0,0,0 );
01890               if( j == 0 ) color = CV_RGB ( 255,200,0 );
01891               if( j >= 1 ) color = CV_RGB ( 155,100,0 );
01892               cvLine( image[c], cvPoint( p[0][0],p[0][1] ), cvPoint( p[1][0],p[1][1] ), color,4,CV_AA,0 );
01893               if( j < 2 ){
01894                 cvLine( image[c], cvPoint( p[1][0],p[1][1] ), cvPoint( p[2][0],p[2][1] ), color,4,CV_AA,0 );
01895                 cvLine( image[c], cvPoint( p[2][0],p[2][1] ), cvPoint( p[3][0],p[3][1] ), color,4,CV_AA,0 );
01896                 cvLine( image[c], cvPoint( p[3][0],p[3][1] ), cvPoint( p[0][0],p[0][1] ), color,4,CV_AA,0 );
01897               }
01898             }
01899             fclose(boxfile);
01900           }
01901         }
01902       }
01903     }
01904     if( cvmGet( m_CH, 0, h ) == 1 && 
01905       cvmGet( m_CH, 1, h ) == 1 &&
01906       cvmGet( m_CH, 2, h ) == 1 &&
01907       cvmGet( m_CH, 3, h ) == 1 &&
01908       cvmGet( m_CH, 4, h ) == 1    ){ //TODO: 0 (alle testen!) intelligenter!!!
01909         // Save image:
01910         IplImage *im = cvCreateImage(cvSize(980,480), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
01911         cvSetImageROI(im, cvRect(0,0,320,240));  cvResize(image[0], im, CV_INTER_LINEAR );
01912         cvSetImageROI(im, cvRect(320,0,320,240)); cvResize(image[1], im, CV_INTER_LINEAR );
01913         cvSetImageROI(im, cvRect(640,0,320,240)); cvResize(image[2], im, CV_INTER_LINEAR );
01914         cvSetImageROI(im, cvRect(0,240,320,240));   cvResize(image[3], im, CV_INTER_LINEAR );
01915         cvSetImageROI(im, cvRect(320,240,320,240)); cvResize(image[4], im, CV_INTER_LINEAR );
01916         cvResetImageROI(im);
01917         cvLine( im, cvPoint( 0,240 ), cvPoint( 980,240 ), CV_RGB ( 255,255,255 ),2,CV_AA,0 );
01918         cvLine( im, cvPoint( 320,0 ), cvPoint( 320,480 ), CV_RGB ( 255,255,255 ),2,CV_AA,0 );
01919         cvLine( im, cvPoint( 640,0 ), cvPoint( 640,480 ), CV_RGB ( 255,255,255 ),2,CV_AA,0 );
01920         sprintf(file_name,"__cam%04d_%04d.bmp",cnt,h);
01921         cvSaveImage( file_name, im );
01922         cvReleaseImage( &image[0] ); //TODO!
01923         cvReleaseImage( &image[1] ); //TODO!
01924         cvReleaseImage( &image[2] ); //TODO!
01925         cvReleaseImage( &image[3] ); //TODO!
01926         cvReleaseImage( &image[4] ); //TODO!
01927         cvReleaseImage( &im ); //TODO!
01928         printf("File __cam%04d.bmp written!\n",cnt);
01929         cnt++;
01930     }
01931   }
01932 }
