02037 
02038 
02039 void CamCalibration::PrintOptimizedResultErrors( double *params){
02040   CamCalibration *cam = this;
02041 
02042   double total_error_opt = 0;
02043   double total_error_org = 0;
02044   double chi_error_opt   = 0;
02045   double chi_error_org   = 0;
02046   float  error_opt[50000]; 
02047   float  error_org[50000]; 
02048   float  error_gra[10][3000]; 
02049   int    obs = 0;
02050 
02051   // Calculate errors:
02052   for( int c = 0; c < (int)cam->v_camera.size(); c++ )         // ... cameras
02053     for( int h = 0; h < (int)cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ ){    // ... homographies
02054       error_gra[c][h] = 0;
02055       if( cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){
02056         int points = cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->p;
02057         for( int point = 0; point < points; point++ ){
02058 
02059           // Original point on the screen:
02060           cam->HomogenousNormalizeVector( cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->v_m_pp[point] );
02061           double u1 = cvmGet( cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->v_m_pp[point], 0, 0 );
02062           double v1 = cvmGet( cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->v_m_pp[point], 1, 0 );
02063 
02064           // Projected point on the screen:
02065           double a_p[4];  double a_p3[3]; double a_p4[3];
02066           double a_RT[12]; CvMat m_RT = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_RT );
02067           a_p[0] = cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->px[point]; a_p[2] = 0;
02068           a_p[1] = cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->py[point]; a_p[3] = 1;
02069           CvMat m_p  = cvMat( 4, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p );  // plane point (flat)
02070           CvMat m_p3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p3 ); // eye point 2
02071           CvMat m_p4 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p4 ); // image point
02072           cam->Mat3x4Mul( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], cam->s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], &m_RT );
02073           cvMatMul( &m_RT, &m_p, &m_p3 );
02074           cvMatMul( cam->s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], &m_p3, &m_p4 );
02075           cam->HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p4 );
02076           double u2 = cvmGet( &m_p4, 0, 0 );
02077           double v2 = cvmGet( &m_p4, 1, 0 );
02078 
02079           // Projected points with original homography:
02080           double u3,v3;
02081           cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography->transform_point(
02082             cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->px[point],
02083             cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->py[point],
02084             &u3,&v3 );
02085 
02086           // Calculate error:
02087           double current_error_opt = sqrt( pow(u1-u2,2) + pow(v1-v2,2) );
02088           double current_error_org = sqrt( pow(u1-u3,2) + pow(v1-v3,2) );
02089           chi_error_opt += pow(u1-u2,2) + pow(v1-v2,2);
02090           chi_error_org += pow(u1-u3,2) + pow(v1-v3,2);
02091           error_opt[obs]    = (float)current_error_opt;
02092           total_error_opt  += current_error_opt;
02093           error_org[obs]    = (float)current_error_org;
02094           total_error_org  += current_error_org;
02095           obs++;
02096 
02097           // For error graphic:
02098           error_gra[c][h] += (float)( current_error_opt/(double)points );
02099         }
02100       }
02101     }
02102 
02103     // Print results to screen if more than one observation has been found:
02104     if( obs > 0 ){
02105       chi_error_opt /= (double)obs * 2.0;
02106       chi_error_org /= (double)obs * 2.0;
02107       double avg_error_opt = total_error_opt / (double)obs;
02108       double avg_error_org = total_error_org / (double)obs;
02109       double std_dev_opt   = 0;
02110       double std_dev_org   = 0;
02111       double max_error_opt = 0;
02112       double max_error_org = 0;
02113       double min_error_opt = total_error_opt;
02114       double min_error_org = total_error_org;
02115       for( int j = 0; j < obs; j++ ){
02116         if( error_opt[j] > max_error_opt ) max_error_opt = error_opt[j];
02117         if( error_org[j] > max_error_org ) max_error_org = error_org[j];
02118         if( error_opt[j] < min_error_opt ) min_error_opt = error_opt[j];
02119         if( error_org[j] < min_error_org ) min_error_org = error_org[j];
02120         std_dev_opt += pow( error_opt[j]-avg_error_opt, 2 );
02121         std_dev_org += pow( error_org[j]-avg_error_org, 2 );
02122       }
02123       std_dev_opt = sqrt(std_dev_opt/(double)obs);
02124       std_dev_org = sqrt(std_dev_org/(double)obs);
02125 
02126       // Plot cameras:
02127       printf("\n                  Focal   Aspect      u_0      v_0  Hnum\n");
02128       for( int c = 0; c < (int)cam->v_camera.size(); c++ )
02129         if( params[c*4+1] != 0 ){
02130           int hom = 0;
02131           for( int h = 0; h < (int)cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )
02132             if( cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
02133               hom++;
02134           printf( "Camera %02d:     %8.3f %8.3f %8.3f %8.3f %5d\n",
02135             c, 
02136             params[c*4+1], params[c*4]/params[c*4+1] ,  params[c*4+2], params[c*4+3],
02137             hom );
02138         }
02139 
02140         // Plot Errors:
02141         printf("\n                                 Optimal  Original\n");
02142         printf("Maximal error in observations:  %8.3f  %8.3f\n", max_error_opt, max_error_org );
02143         printf("Minimal error in observations:  %8.3f  %8.3f\n", min_error_opt, min_error_org );
02144         printf("Average error in observations:  %8.3f  %8.3f\n", avg_error_opt, avg_error_org );
02145         printf("Chi^2 error in observations:    %8.3f  %8.3f\n", chi_error_opt, chi_error_org );
02146         printf("Standard deviation of error:    %8.3f  %8.3f\n", std_dev_opt,   std_dev_org   );
02147         printf("Number of observations:         %8i  %8i\n", obs, obs);
02148 
02149         // Init error histogram graphic:
02150         int width  = 1024; //TODO: Hier groesse aus Parametern!
02151         int height = 768;
02152         IplImage *im = cvCreateImage( cvSize( width, height ), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3 );
02153         CvFont font;
02154         cvInitFont( &font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, 1, 1, 0, 2, 8 );
02155 
02156         // Get maximal error for scaling:
02157         double max_error = 0;
02158         for( int c = 0; c < (int)cam->v_camera.size(); c++ )        // ... cameras
02159           for( int h = (int)cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography.size()-1; h >= 0 ; h-- )  // ... homographies
02160             if( cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography )
02161               if( error_gra[c][h] > max_error )
02162                 max_error = error_gra[c][h];
02163         max_error *= 1.2;
02164 
02165         // Draw background:
02166         double cut_error = 1; //TODO: Hier Parameter wert!
02167         int y_cut = (int)((double)height-(double)height*cut_error/max_error);
02168         cvRectangle( im, cvPoint( 0,     0 ), cvPoint( width,  y_cut ), CV_RGB ( 100,100,100 ), CV_FILLED, 8, 0 );
02169         cvRectangle( im, cvPoint( 0, y_cut ), cvPoint( width, height ), CV_RGB ( 0,    0,  0 ), CV_FILLED, 8, 0 );
02170 
02171         // Draw error histogram:
02172         char info[200];
02173         for( int c = 0; c < (int)cam->v_camera.size(); c++ )        // ... cameras
02174           for( int h = (int)cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography.size()-1; h >= 0 ; h-- )  // ... homographies
02175             if( cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){
02176               int x = (int)((double)width*(double)h/(double)cam->v_camera[c]->v_homography.size());
02177               int y = (int)((double)height-(double)height*error_gra[c][h]/max_error);
02178               cvLine( im, cvPoint( x,y ), cvPoint( x,height ), CV_RGB ( 255,255,255 ), 2, CV_AA, 0 );
02179               cvCircle( im, cvPoint( x,y ), 2, CV_RGB ( 255,200,0 ), 2, CV_AA, 0 );
02180               if( error_gra[c][h]/max_error > 0.3 ){
02181                 sprintf( info, "%i", h );
02182                 cvPutText( im, info, cvPoint( x+1,y-1 ), &font, CV_RGB ( 255,200,0 ) );
02183               }
02184             }
02185 
02186             // Titles:
02187             sprintf( info, "%.3f", max_error );
02188             cvPutText( im, info, cvPoint( 10,30 ), &font, CV_RGB ( 255,0,0 ) );
02189             sprintf( info, "%.3f", 0 );
02190             cvPutText( im, info, cvPoint( 10,height-10 ), &font, CV_RGB ( 255,0,0 ) );
02191             if( cut_error > 0.1*max_error && cut_error < 0.9*max_error ){  
02192               sprintf( info, "%.3f", cut_error );
02193               cvPutText( im, info, cvPoint( 10,y_cut-5 ), &font, CV_RGB ( 255,0,0 ) );
02194             }
02195             sprintf( info, "Maximal Camera Error in Pixel over homographies", 0 );  
02196             cvPutText( im, info, cvPoint( 150,30 ), &font, CV_RGB ( 200,255,100 ) );
02197 
02198             /*
02199             // Print errorgraphic to file:
02200             char file_name[200];
02201             sprintf( file_name, "error_graphic_%02d.jpg", cam->errorgraphic_counter++ );
02202             cvSaveImage( file_name, im );
02203             */
02204             IplImage *im2 = cvCreateImage(cvSize(800,600), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3); //TODO: Hier echte groesse von parametern!
02205             cvResize(im, im2, CV_INTER_LINEAR );
02206             cvShowImage( "Error Histogram", im2 );
02207             cvWaitKey(10);
02208             cvReleaseImage( &im );
02209             cvReleaseImage( &im2 );
02210             //printf( "File error_graphic_%02d.jpg successfully stored!\n\n", cam->errorgraphic_counter );
02211             printf( "==================================================\n" );
02212     } else {
02213       printf("\n\n----------   Calibration results:   ----------\n");
02214       printf("ERROR: No observations found!\n\n");
02215     }
02216 }
02217 
02218 bool CamCalibration::FilterHomographiesAfterOptimization( double p_PostFilter ){
02219   bool filtered = false;
02220   printf( "INFO: Starting post-filtering process...\n" );
02221 
02222   // Post filter homographies:
02223   for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )        // ... cameras
02224     for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ ){   // ... homographies
02225       if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){
02226         int    points = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->p;
02227         double error  = 0;
02228         for( int point = 0; point < points; point++ ){
02229 
02230           // Original point on the screen:
02231           HomogenousNormalizeVector( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->v_m_pp[point] );
02232           double u1 = cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->v_m_pp[point], 0, 0 );
02233           double v1 = cvmGet( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->v_m_pp[point], 1, 0 );
02234 
02235           // Projected point on the screen:
02236           double a_p[4];  double a_p3[3]; double a_p4[3];
02237           double a_RT[12]; CvMat m_RT = cvMat( 3, 4, CV_64FC1, a_RT );
02238           a_p[0] = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->px[point]; a_p[2] = 0;
02239           a_p[1] = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->py[point]; a_p[3] = 1;
02240           CvMat m_p  = cvMat( 4, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p );  // plane point (flat)
02241           CvMat m_p3 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p3 ); // eye point 2
02242           CvMat m_p4 = cvMat( 3, 1, CV_64FC1, a_p4 ); // image point
02243           Mat3x4Mul( s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], &m_RT );
02244           cvMatMul( &m_RT, &m_p, &m_p3 );
02245           cvMatMul( s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], &m_p3, &m_p4 );
02246           HomogenousNormalizeVector( &m_p4 );
02247           double u2 = cvmGet( &m_p4, 0, 0 );
02248           double v2 = cvmGet( &m_p4, 1, 0 );
02249 
02250           // Calculate error:
02251           double current_error_opt = sqrt( pow(u1-u2,2) + pow(v1-v2,2) );
02252           error += current_error_opt/(double)points;
02253         }
02254         if( error > p_PostFilter ){
02255           for( int c2 = 0; c2 < (int)v_camera.size(); c2++ ){
02256             DeleteWorldPlaneHomography( c2, h );
02257             cvmSet( m_CH, c2, h, 0 );
02258             cvReleaseMat( &s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h] );
02259             cvReleaseMat( &s_optimal.v_homography_r_t_jacobian[h] );
02260           }
02261           printf( "INFO: View %i has been deleted for all cameras!\n", h );
02262           filtered = true;
02263         }
02264       }
02265     }
02266 
02267     if( !filtered )
02268       printf( "INFO: Nothing filtered!\n" );
02269 
02270     // Return true if at least one homography has been filtered:
02271     printf( "INFO: Post-filtering process finished.\n\n" );
02272     return filtered;
02273 }
02274 
02275 bool CamCalibration::OptimizeCalibrationByMinimalParameterMethod( int iter, double eps, double p_PostFilter ){
02276 
02277   // Create optimal camera structure for the first time:
02278   if( !CreateOptimalCameraStructure() ){
02279     printf("ERROR: Optial camera structure estimation failed!\n");
02280     return false;
02281   }
02282 
02283   // Reset counter for error histogram and create an output window:
02284   errorgraphic_counter = 0;
02285   cvNamedWindow( "Error Histogram", CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE );
02286   cvWaitKey(10);
02287 
02288   // Start calibration:
02289   //double post_filter_offset = 20;
02290   do {
02291 
02292     // Get number parameters and observations:
02293     int parameter_number   = GetParameterNumber();
02294     /* int observation_number = GetObservationNumber(); */ 
02295 
02296     ls_minimizer2 minimizer(parameter_number);
02297     minimizer.set_state_change_callback(updateCB);
02298     minimizer.set_user_data(0, this);
02299     minimizer.lm_set_max_iterations(iter);
02300     //minimizer.set_verbose_level(3);
02301     ProjObs::parameterNumber = parameter_number;
02302 
02303     // Feed with initial parameters:
02304     GetParameterSetFromOptimalStructure();
02305 
02306     /*
02307     LsqData *lsqData = AllocateLsqData( parameter_number, observation_number );
02308     SetLsqGlobals( lsqData, iter, eps, GAUSS_JORDAN, updateCB, true );
02309     LsqObs *obs      = AllocateLsqObs( lsqData, sizeof(LsqObs), observation_number, 4 );
02310     lsqData->slot1   = this;
02311 
02312     // Feed with initial parameters:
02313     GetParameterSetFromOptimalStructure();
02314     FillLsqParams( lsqData, &v_opt_param[0], 0, 0 );
02315     lsqData->Dsp.F = PrintOptimizedResultErrors;
02316     */
02317 
02318     // Add the observations for ...
02319     for( int c = 0; c < (int)v_camera.size(); c++ )         // ... cameras
02320       for( int h = 0; h < (int)v_camera[c]->v_homography.size(); h++ )   // ... homographies
02321         if( v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->m_homography ){     
02322           int points = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object->p;
02323           for( int point = 0; point < points; point++ ) { // ... points 
02324 
02325             // Add homography number and point:
02326             ProjObs *o = new ProjObs();
02327             o->cam = c;
02328             o->hom = h;
02329             o->point = point;
02330 
02331             // Add screen plane point (reference!):
02332             s_struct_plane* s_plane_object = v_camera[c]->v_homography[h]->s_plane_object;
02333             HomogenousNormalizeVector( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[point] );
02334             o->target[0] = cvmGet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[point], 0, 0 );
02335             o->target[1] = cvmGet( (*s_plane_object).v_m_pp[point], 1, 0 );
02336 
02337             minimizer.add_observation(o, true, false);
02338           }
02339         }
02340 
02341         minimizer.minimize_using_levenberg_marquardt_from(&v_opt_param[0]);
02342         void *ptr=this;
02343         updateCB( minimizer.state, &ptr);
02344 
02345         // post filter offset in test phase! remove, please!
02346         //if( post_filter_offset > 1 )
02347         // post_filter_offset -= 10;
02348 
02349         // Redo calibration if at least one homography was post-filtered:
02350   } while( FilterHomographiesAfterOptimization( p_PostFilter/*+post_filter_offset*/ ) );
02351 
02352   // Destroy histogram output window:
02353   cvDestroyAllWindows();
02354   return true;
02355 }
02356 
02357 void CamCalibration::PrintOptimizedResultsToFile1()
02358 {
02359   FILE *stream;
02360 
02361   // Print cameras intrinsic matrix to file:
02362   if( (stream = fopen( "camera_c.txt", "w+t" )) != NULL ){
02363     for( int c = 0; c < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_c.size(); c++ ){
02364       fprintf( stream, "no: %i\n", c );
02365       fprintf( stream, "width: %i\n", v_camera[c]->w );
02366       fprintf( stream, "height: %i\n", v_camera[c]->h );
02367       showmatrix_file( *s_optimal.v_camera_c[c], stream );
02368     }
02369     fclose( stream );
02370   }
02371 
02372   // Print cameras extrinsic matrix to file:
02373   if( (stream = fopen( "camera_r_t.txt", "w+t" )) != NULL ){
02374     for( int c = 0; c < (int)s_optimal.v_camera_c.size(); c++ ){
02375       fprintf( stream, "no: %i\n", c );
02376       fprintf( stream, "width: %i\n", v_camera[c]->w );
02377       fprintf( stream, "height: %i\n", v_camera[c]->h );
02378       showmatrix_file( *s_optimal.v_camera_r_t[c], stream );
02379     }
02380     fclose( stream );
02381   }
02382 
02383   // Print views to file:
02384   if( (stream = fopen( "view_r_t.txt", "w+t" )) != NULL ){
02385     for( int h = 0; h < (int)s_optimal.v_homography_r_t.size(); h++ ){
02386       if( s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h] ){
02387         fprintf( stream, "no: %i\n", h );
02388         showmatrix_file( *s_optimal.v_homography_r_t[h], stream );
02389       }
02390     }
02391     fclose( stream );
02392   }
02393 }
